name: Olento in Candyland
description:
Olento has arrived in Candyland and gobbles up cookies as fast as they can... However, the skeleton residents of Candyland are getting annoyed with Olento's manners.

You, the Olento, must find the key in the level and go to the door while avoiding the orange and blue skeletons!

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys: move Olento

Mouse: navigate menu buttons

---

Made for Game Development Essentials course in 2020. This project was more or less a prototype that I made on my own in Unity. It contains only one level! In the future I hope to make more games featuring Olento...
